DOC.brief_summary: Prospective , open label , self - control , single arm , clinical study assess performance UltraShape Power use U-Sculpt-N outer thigh and/or flank circumference reduction versus self-control .
DOC.brief_title: UltraShape Power Combination With U-sculpt-n Transducer
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject ≥25 ≤60 year age time enrollment 2 . BMI≤ 28 3 . Fat thickness least 1.5 cm outer thigh and/or flank ( measure calibrate caliper ) 4 . For woman childbearing potential : negative urine pregnancy test 5 . General good health confirm medical history skin examination treat area 6 . Subject understands study requirement treatment procedure provide write Informed Consent studyspecific test procedure perform . 7 . The subject commits return schedule postoperative followup visit clinic Willingness refrain change diet/ exercise/medication regimen entire course study 1 . History unbalanced hypertension , ischemic heart disease , valvular heart disease , congestive heart failure , pacemaker/defibrillator 2 . Current hyperlipidemia , diabetes mellitus , hepatitis , liver disease , HIV positive status , blood coagulopathy excessive bleeding , autoimmune connective tissue disease 3 .
